alertModal.title: Notification
alertModal.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close? Your changes will be lost.
alertModal.unsavedChangesTabSwitchMessage: You have unsaved changes. Please save or revert your changes before switching tabs.
alertModal.attemptCloseDirtyMessage: You have unsaved changes. Please save or discard them before closing.
alertModal.invalidCustomRpcAlert: Custom RPC Endpoint must be a valid URL.
alertModal.invalidMaxCapAlert: Invalid Max Priority Fee Cap. Please enter a non-negative number.
alertModal.invalidSlippageAlert: Invalid Slippage. Please enter a non-negative number (in BPS).
alertModal.rpcUpdateAlert: RPC endpoint updated. A page refresh may be needed for it to take full effect.
alertModal.unsavedChangesAlert: You have unsaved changes. Please save or revert them before switching tabs.

tooltips.unsavedChanges: Appears when you have unsaved changes and try to navigate away
tooltips.invalidCustomRpc: Appears when the entered RPC URL is not valid
tooltips.invalidMaxCap: Appears when the entered max priority fee is invalid
tooltips.invalidSlippage: Appears when the entered slippage tolerance is invalid
tooltips.rpcUpdate: Appears when RPC endpoint is successfully updated

toast.tokenDataInvalid: Token data invalid for target calculation.
toast.cannotDepositToTarget: Cannot deposit to reach target, token already at or above.
toast.internalPrecisionError: Internal error: Precision scale factor is zero.
toast.lessThanMinTransfer: Target deposit amount is less than minimum transferable unit.
toast.requiredAmountExceedsBalance: Required amount exceeds balance. Setting to max.
toast.noPoolBalanceDelisted: No pool balance to withdraw for this delisted token.
toast.cannotCalcDelistedValue: Cannot calculate value of delisted token balance.
toast.requiredWlqiExceedsBalance: Required wLQI withdraw amount exceeds your balance. Setting to max.
toast.cannotWithdrawToTarget: Cannot withdraw to reach target, token already at or below.
toast.calculatedTargetTooSmall: Calculated target amount is too small.
toast.noUserBalanceToDeposit: You have no balance to deposit.
toast.noUserBalanceToWithdraw: You have no wLQI to withdraw.

tooltips.error: Shown for critical errors that prevent an action
tooltips.success: Shown when an action completes successfully
tooltips.info: Shown for important information that doesn't require action
tooltips.warning: Shown for potential issues that should be addressed

poolInteractions.insufficientSol: Insufficient SOL balance for transaction fees. Need ~{{amount}} SOL.
poolInteractions.priceFeedNotFound: Price feed account not found or configured for {{action}} token {{mint}} in PoolConfig.
poolInteractions.programWalletPoolConfigMissing: Program, wallet, or pool config not available.
poolInteractions.walletNoSign: Wallet does not support signing transactions.
poolInteractions.wlqiDecimalsMissing: wLQI decimals not available for withdrawal processing.
poolInteractions.highFeeConfirmation: You are about to {{action}} with a fee of at least {{percent}}%. This will cause a loss of at least {{percent}}% of your {{action}}. Do you want to proceed?

tooltips.priorityLabel: Transaction priority affects confirmation speed and fee
tooltips.approximateFee: Estimated fee for the current transaction priority

settings.title: Settings
settings.maxCapDescription: Max SOL to spend on priority fees per transaction.

tooltips.numberFormatting: Customize how numbers are displayed throughout the application
tooltips.decimalSeparator: Choose how decimal points are displayed in numbers
tooltips.thousandSeparator: Choose how thousands are separated in numbers
tooltips.preferredCurrency: Select your preferred currency for displaying values
tooltips.preferredExplorer: Choose your preferred blockchain explorer for viewing transactions
tooltips.customRpcUrl: Set a custom RPC endpoint for better performance or reliability
tooltips.rpcLatency: Current response time of the RPC endpoint
tooltips.slippageTolerance: Maximum acceptable price difference between expected and actual transaction price
tooltips.maxCap: Maximum amount of SOL you're willing to spend on priority fees per transaction
tooltips.feeCapped: Selected priority fee ({{feeLevel}}) is above your Max Cap. Effective fee is capped, potentially reducing priority. Check Settings.
tooltips.feeNormal: Effective priority fee based on current settings.
tooltips.feeLevelCapped: {{feeLevel}} selected, but capped by Max Fee of ~{{maxCapValue}} SOL.

walletModal.needWallet: You need a wallet on Solana to continue

tooltips.copyAddress: Copy your wallet address to clipboard

walletProfile.noOtherTokensFound: No other tokens found in your wallet.

tooltips.delistedTokens: Tokens that have fallen out of the top 30 and are available for withdrawal with bonus
